attributes.action: legislate to abolish BBC3 and return taxpayers money to taxpayers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BBC3 reached a new nadir with the broadcast of "Can Fat Teens Hunt?" in which 'dangerously overweight' (BBC terminology) teenagers spend time trying to hunt with the Iban people of Borneo. This petition demands the abolition of BBC3 (home of such classics as 'F*** Off, I'm a Hairy Woman' and 'Help me Anthea, I'm Infested') and the return of taxpayers money spent so far on this channel to be returned to taxpayers in the form of a 1-year suspension of the licence fee.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
